name: Paradroid: Metal Edition
overview: Paradroid with Morpheus style graphics. As well as achieving a high score, Paradroid players can aim to completely clear one or more ships of robots and to achieve a successful transfer from the 001 Influence Device to the unstable 999 droid. Despite the instructions referring to a finite fleet, the Commodore 64 game never ends. When you clear the eighth ship called "Itsnotardenuff", you're just placed back on the ship with higher-ranking droids on each deck.
